channel.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
channel.description: I'm curious to see what people play. You may also post a reason on why you still play :)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

I currently play OSRS.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Chronikk_HD, post:24, topic:536258”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=655070.msg4395968#msg4395968 date=1389131331]
I don’t understand why people hate the SoF and Solomon’s store so much. Just to have something to complain about?
[/quote]

I guess people don’t like change too much. Personally, I liked the SOF… lol. It was like a lottery system, you could have been broke and spun the wheel and got like 200m and at one time im pretty sure I seen a BGS in the spin… could be wrong but im sure it was there.[/quote]
A bgs? No. A “lucky” bgs, yes. There are quiet a few items they put on the sof that aren’t tradeable, actually most the rares are that.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I don’t understand why people hate the SoF and Solomon’s store so much. Just to have something to complain about?

I guess people don’t like change too much. Personally, I liked the SOF… lol. It was like a lottery system, you could have been broke and spun the wheel and got like 200m and at one time im pretty sure I seen a BGS in the spin… could be wrong but im sure it was there.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

So I had a few free days to myself so I decided to try out divination. The skill it self is repetitive and sucks, but this lead me to try out some other aspects of the game. I did a slayer task using magic and actually found it fairly entertaining with the EOC updates.

I still have no fudgeing clue what is going on in the game in terms of these god wars and what weapons/armor are good or bad but its really not that bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

I play rs2007 mostly just because I like using the old combat system, and because I enjoyed the game a lot more before they added all the new stuff to rs. I also rsps every so often whenever I find a fun server.

item.source: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

I still play RS 2007 from time to time. I wish I had the time to actually play the game though. I want to get back into RSPS either being staff/creating, or even just playing but it’s like im just not that into mopar anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:9, topic:536258”]No. I enjoyed RS for its simplicity. If I wanted an action-bar type of game I would just load up WoW or GW2.

I played 07 for a bit, but I simply do not have the time to play the game properly.[/quote]
Same for me pretty much. I still like servers a little too but not like I used to. I may give RS3 a try over winter break.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’s RS3, not EoC. EoC was the stage between RS2 and RS3.

I play RS3 and RSPS personally.

RS3 actually has shit to offer and I got used to the combat/interfaces mostly.

RSPS can be fun when you get the ‘right’ server.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

No. I enjoyed RS for its simplicity. If I wanted an action-bar type of game I would just load up WoW or GW2.

I played 07 for a bit, but I simply do not have the time to play the game properly.

item.source: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I would love to get back into RS3 again, because I’m sure all of the updates would be exciting, but I’ve been cut off from the game since late 2011, which means I have a lot to catch up on (at least story-wise). I guess it would make a big difference if I had more time to play and if people I knew really well still played.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you still play RS? (rsps,07 included)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I don’t play any anymore, but I just tried to sign into Rs3. I can’t remember one of the passwords, but I’m guessing the previous owner recovered it. And my other account was banned in April for goldfarming. (Which I don’t even remember doing, and they have no evidence so idk). Now all I have is this account that is pure f2p and kind of sucks. It’s my first account from 2006 or 2007, but I’d rather have my accounts with 99s back. ):

Read full topic
